mapper.select: select count(*) as count from ( select t1.*, t2.* from (SELECT t.parent_id as BASE_TRAIN_ID1, t.parent_name as TRAIN_NBR, T.CHILD_INDEX AS STN_SORT, T.NAME AS STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname AS STN_BUREAU, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS ARR_TIME, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS DPT_TIME, 0 as run_days, T.TRACK_NAME AS TRACK_NAME FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_SITEM T UNION all SELECT t.parent_id, t.parent_name as TRAIN_NBR, T.CHILD_INDEX AS STN_SORT, T.NAME AS STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname AS STN_BUREAU, TO_CHAR(T.SOURCE_TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS ARR_TIME, TO_CHAR(T.TARGET_TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS DPT_TIME, t.relative_source_time_day run_days, T.TRACK_NAME AS TRACK_NAME FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_RITEM T UNION all SELECT t.parent_id, t.parent_name as TRAIN_NBR, T.CHILD_INDEX AS STN_SORT, T.NAME AS STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname AS STN_BUREAU, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS ARR_TIME, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS DPT_TIME, t.relative_time_day run_days, T.TRACK_NAME AS TRACK_NAME FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_TITEM T) t2, (select t.id as BASE_TRAIN_ID, s1.ljpym START_BUREAU, t.Source_Bureau_Name START_BUREAU_FULL, t.source_node_name START_STN, s2.ljpym END_BUREAU, t.target_bureau_name END_BUREAU_FULL, t.target_node_name END_STN, TO_CHAR(T.Source_Time, 'hh24:mi:SS') START_TIME, TO_CHAR(t.target_time, 'hh24:mi:SS') END_TIME, t.route_bureau_shortnames PASS_BUREAU, t.type_id TRAIN_TYPE_ID, t.relative_target_time_day run_days_all from JHPT_RJH.m_trainlinetemp t, jhpt_jcsj.ljzd s1, jhpt_jcsj.ljzd s2 where t.scheme_id = #{chartId} and t.operation = #{operation} and t.source_bureau_name = s1.ljqc(+) and t.target_bureau_name = s2.ljqc(+)) t1 where t1.BASE_TRAIN_ID = t2.BASE_TRAIN_ID1 order by t1.BASE_TRAIN_ID, STN_SORT )

select * from ( select rownum num,o.* from ( select t1.*, t2.* from (SELECT t.parent_id as BASE_TRAIN_ID1, t.parent_name as TRAIN_NBR, T.CHILD_INDEX AS STN_SORT, T.NAME AS STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname AS STN_BUREAU, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS ARR_TIME, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS DPT_TIME, 0 as run_days, T.TRACK_NAME AS TRACK_NAME FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_SITEM T UNION all SELECT t.parent_id, t.parent_name as TRAIN_NBR, T.CHILD_INDEX AS STN_SORT, T.NAME AS STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname AS STN_BUREAU, TO_CHAR(T.SOURCE_TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS ARR_TIME, TO_CHAR(T.TARGET_TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS DPT_TIME, t.relative_source_time_day run_days, T.TRACK_NAME AS TRACK_NAME FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_RITEM T UNION all SELECT t.parent_id, t.parent_name as TRAIN_NBR, T.CHILD_INDEX AS STN_SORT, T.NAME AS STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname AS STN_BUREAU, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS ARR_TIME, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS DPT_TIME, t.relative_time_day run_days, T.TRACK_NAME AS TRACK_NAME FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_TITEM T) t2, (select t.id as BASE_TRAIN_ID, s1.ljpym START_BUREAU, t.Source_Bureau_Name START_BUREAU_FULL, t.source_node_name START_STN, s2.ljpym END_BUREAU, t.target_bureau_name END_BUREAU_FULL, t.target_node_name END_STN, TO_CHAR(T.Source_Time, 'hh24:mi:SS') START_TIME, TO_CHAR(t.target_time, 'hh24:mi:SS') END_TIME, t.route_bureau_shortnames PASS_BUREAU, t.type_id TRAIN_TYPE_ID, t.relative_target_time_day run_days_all from JHPT_RJH.m_trainlinetemp t, jhpt_jcsj.ljzd s1, jhpt_jcsj.ljzd s2 where t.scheme_id =#{chartId} and t.operation =#{operation} and t.source_bureau_name = s1.ljqc(+) and t.target_bureau_name = s2.ljqc(+)) t1 where t1.BASE_TRAIN_ID = t2.BASE_TRAIN_ID1 order by t1.BASE_TRAIN_ID, STN_SORT
) o ) where num >=#{rownumstart} AND num <=#{rownumend}
